description: Defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to authentication, including registration, login requests, and user summaries for responses.

classes.name: RegisterRequest
classes.description: Payload for user registration containing email, username, password, and optional display name.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Payload for user login including email or username and password.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: Response object after authentication, including JWT token and user summary.

classes.name: UserSummary
classes.description: A simplified user object with ID, email, username, and optional display name.
